# AnalyzeResp

The data analysis functions are frequently updated, please make sure you have the latest version. (July 17, 2025)


## Installation:

The latest version of AnalyzeResp can be installed from [GitHub](https://github.com/) following:

``` r
install.packages("devtools") # if devtools is not installed
devtools::install_github("kraskura/AnalyzeResp")
library(AnalyzeResp)

```
*The older version of this code was shared with users as one R script*
